## Overview

## tl;dr
<!-- Nice Example Joke -->

<!-- Explanation: -->
```{r}
# str(mammals)
row.names(mammals)

```


```{r tldr-show-plot, echo=FALSE}
library(MASS) # data
library(ggplot2) # plotting

ggplot(mammals, aes(x = body, y = brain)) +
  geom_point(col = "#ff0000") +
  # geom_text(aes(label = ifelse(body > 1000, as.character(row.names(mammals)),'')), hjust = 0, vjust = 0) +
  # geom_text(aes(label = row.names(mammals)), hjust = 0, vjust = 0) +
  geom_text(aes(label = ifelse(row.names(mammals) == "Human" | row.names(mammals) == "Asian elephant", as.character(row.names(mammals)),'')), hjust = 1.1, vjust = -.1) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  ggtitle("Testing out Scatterplots", subtitle = "Testing some more")

# rat
# human
# elephant

```

### Boxplot using ggplot2
```{r ggplot}
# import ggplot
library(ggplot2)

# plot data
g1 <- ggplot(stack(airquality), aes(x = ind, y = values)) + 
  geom_boxplot(fill = "lightBlue") +
  # extra formatting
  labs(x = "") +
  ggtitle("ggplot2 Boxplots of airquality")

g1
```
